s: We purchased this monster tower fkr our brand new 2024 Monterey 224FS. We followed the instructions on the installation only to have the tower tilt and slide leaving gouge marks on our tower. I cranked down on the bolt using the tool the set came with, but they loosened while on the water.

Monster Towers are designed to be easy to install so you can do it yourself or rely on one of hundreds of capable Monster Tower dealers around the globe. The idea is that Monster wants you spending time enjoying yourself, not tweaking and adjusting your tower after every ride.
